name: Mount Elbert
description: The highest peak in Colorado and the second-highest in the contiguous U.S. A popular and scenic climb suitable for most hikers.

name: Pikes Peak
description: One of the most famous mountains in the U.S., known for its road to the summit and breathtaking views of the Front Range.

name: Mount Massive
description: Just 12 feet shorter than Mount Elbert, Mount Massive offers multiple ridgelines and is known for its wide summit area.

name: Longs Peak
description: Located in Rocky Mountain National Park, this climb features the famous 'Keyhole Route' and requires scrambling near the summit.

name: Mount Whitney
description: The tallest mountain in the contiguous United States. Requires a permit and offers challenging but spectacular views.
